chapters.title: Chapter 12: Unexpected Encounters
chapters.info: Yukiri, p. 204—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She is quite small, and is a Sitter for the Gray. She was the daughter of an innkeeper, and is always the last Gray to join the Gray consensus in the Hall. She is now an ally of Saerin and Pevara in hunting down Darkfriends in the Tower. She is one of the shortest people Egwene has ever met. She always seems to be in control. See also Asnobar, Saerin; Herimon, Seaine; Tazanovni, Pevara.
